sn33.6-10:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbajako bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn33.6-10:1.3: “ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo, yanimani anekavihitani ditthigatani loke uppajjanti—
sn33.6-10:1.4: sassato lokoti va, asassato lokoti va …pe…
sn33.6-10:1.5: neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param maranati va”ti?
sn33.6-10:1.11: vinnane kho, vaccha, adassana …pe… vinnananirodhagaminiya patipadaya adassana …pe….
